transformations.name: MapDrifted2
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		type as string,
		properties as (Asset_Id as string, Fund_Id as string, OBJECTID as string, Property as string, Crop_Type as string, Plant_Year as string, State as string, Area_Ha as double, SHAPE_Leng as double, SHAPE_Area as double),
		geometry as (type as string, coordinates as string)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	backslashEscape: true) ~> geojsonmodified
Filter1 select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID = asset_id,
		Fund_ID = fund_id,
		Loc_Json = loc_json
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
geojsonmodified derive({_corrupt_record} = toString(byName('_corrupt_record')),
		asset_id = properties.Asset_Id,
		fund_id = properties.Fund_Id,
		loc_json = geometry.coordinates) ~> MapDrifted2
MapDrifted2 filter(not(isNull(asset_id))) ~> Filter1
Select1 sink(input(
		asset_id as string,
		fund_id as string,
		loc_geometry as binary,
		loc_json as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		asset_id = Asset_ID,
		fund_id = Fund_ID,
		loc_json = Loc_Json
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Certification_ID as string,
		{Validation Flag} as string,
		{Certification Type} as string,
		{Certification Number} as string,
		{Next Audit Date} as string,
		{Certifying Body} as string,
		{Certification Date} as string,
		{Certification End Date} as string,
		{Certified Entity} as string,
		{Number of Open Minor CARS} as string,
		{Number of Open Major CARS} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_ID,
		{Validation Flag},
		{Certification Type},
		{Certification Number},
		{Next Audit Date},
		{Certifying Body},
		{Certification Date},
		{Certification End Date},
		{Certified Entity},
		{Number of Open Minor CARS},
		{Number of Open Major CARS}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> testparcerts

source(output(
		asset_id as string,
		fund_id as string,
		name as string,
		type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['testUnpivot.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		asset_id,
		fund_id,
		name,
		type
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

WorkbookName.defaultValue: Wenita Forestry Products Q4 FY20 V2.xlsx

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS ERROR_COUNT FROM (
 SELECT DISTINCT LIS.Work_Book, LIS.Work_Sheet FROM 
 audit.OPS_Workbook_Worksheet_Asset_List LIS
 JOIN audit.OPS_Timber_Sales_Error ERR
 ON LIS.Work_Book = ERR.Source_File  
 AND LIS.Work_Sheet = ERR.Source_Sub_File
 WHERE LIS.Work_Book = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}'
 AND LIS.Work_Sheet = '@{pipeline().parameters.Answers}'
)x

WorkbookName.defaultValue: Wenita Forestry Products Q4 FY20 V2.xlsx
Wenita Forestry Products Q4 FY20 V2.xlsx

MasterPipeline.defaultValue: Wenita Forestry Products Q4 FY20 V2.xlsx-Certifications
